text: Linda Lingle (born Linda Cutter; June 4, 1953) is an American politician. She was the sixth Governor of Hawaii. She is a Republican. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:Governors of Hawaii Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish politicians Category:People from Maui Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Linda Lingle
